subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: It is traditional for relievers with the least service time on a team to stock and handle the bullpen bag. What makes Boston’s Hideki Okajima different is that he pitched 11 seasons in Japan.
snippet: It is traditional for relievers with the least service time on a team to stock and handle the bullpen bag. What makes Boston’s Hideki Okajima different is that he pitched 11 seasons in Japan.
